feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING, North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 p.m. ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 6:00 PM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023
Temperature: -0.6°C
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -6
Wind: ESE 20 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of light snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023
